H352.def: = male herbivorous mammal with four legs; ◄ |iovis ladicaudata|i*, fat-tailed sheep; ► clean animal, used for sacrifice, source of meat, hides, wool, and horns; ≈ associated with strength and leadership

H3532.def: = young of a sheep, either male or female; ► eaten at Passover, and used for sacrifice; its fleece is used for clothing

H6842.def: = male domestic animal, generally black in color, found in both shorthaired and longhaired varieties, with horns, usually herded together with sheep; ◄ Capra hircus mambrica or Capra hircus angorensis; ► clean animal, source of milk, hides, hair, and horns, may be used for sacrifice; ≈ sometimes associated with demons, regarded as aggressive

H5795.def: = a fairly small, female domestic animal, usually black and with floppy ears, hooves and relatively short hair, and usually found in one single {L:flock<SDBH:צֹאן>} with sheep; ► raised for its milk, meat, and skin; a clean animal and therefore to be eaten

H4467.def: = state in which a person or deity has been entrusted with the office of {L:king<SDBH:מֶלֶךְ>} or {L:queen<SDBH:מַלְכָּה>}

H4720.def: = part of an object that is considered more holy than the rest

H3063.def: = man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Leah<SDBH:לֵאָה>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}, which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of {L:Solomon<SDBH:שְׁלֹמֹה>}, and, after the exile, a separate administrative district

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H3548.def: = person {L:ordained<SDBH:מלא>} and {L:consecrated<SDBH:קדשׁ>} to perform religious services on behalf of others

H175.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Amram<SDBH:עַמְרָם>} and {L:Jochebed<SDBH:יֹוכֶבֶד>}; brother of {L:Moses<SDBH:מֹשֶׁה>}; tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}; ► first high {L:priest<SDBH:כֹּהֵן>}
